# Smart JSON Comparison System

## Overview
The Smart JSON Comparison System is a configuration-driven solution for comparing JSON files with intelligent normalization and filtering capabilities.

## Key Features
- Configuration-driven comparison rules
- Performance field filtering
- Array normalization and sorting
- Field order normalization
- deepdiff integration

## Configuration File
Details about `compatibility_test/config/comparison_config.json`

Practical examples of smart comparison
